component_text.text: Left click to select, double left-click to zoom to location.
This wall can be destroyed but not breached.

projectile_parent.comment: Shows either projectile (missile) context or bombardment project context. We never have both I am assured!

spread_parent.comment: Shows when have a spread range

component_text.text: This gate is controlled by your alliance. It will open when your units approach.
This gate is not controlled by your forces, you must capture or destroy it to gain access.
